title: Venice imposes new tourist tax to combat overcrowding
description: Venice has introduced a new tourist tax aimed at reducing overcrowding in the historic city. Visitors will be required to pay a fee based on the length of their stay, with funds going towards maintaining the city's infrastructure and heritage sites.

title: Japan sees surge in domestic tourism as international travel remains restricted
description: With international travel restrictions still in place, Japan has seen a surge in domestic tourism. Popular destinations such as Kyoto and Hokkaido have reported record numbers of visitors, with many locals opting for domestic travel instead of overseas vacations.

title: Thailand plans to reopen to international tourists in October
description: Thailand has announced plans to reopen to international tourists in October, with strict entry requirements including proof of vaccination and negative Covid-19 tests. The country's tourism industry has been hit hard by the pandemic, and the reopening is seen as a crucial step towards recovery.

title: Egypt unveils plans to develop Red Sea tourist resorts
description: Egypt has announced plans to develop new tourist resorts along the Red Sea, in a bid to boost its tourism industry. The project will include the construction of new hotels, marinas, and other facilities, with the aim of attracting more international visitors.

title: France introduces new measures to combat overtourism in Paris
description: In an effort to combat overtourism, the French government has introduced new measures in Paris, including limits on short-term rentals and a ban on tourist buses in certain areas. The city has been grappling with overcrowding and other issues caused by the influx of visitors in recent years.

title: Maldives launches new campaign to attract luxury travelers
description: The Maldives has launched a new campaign aimed at attracting luxury travelers, with a focus on high-end resorts and experiences. The island nation has long been a popular destination for honeymooners and other upscale travelers, and the new campaign aims to build on that reputation.

title: Italy's Cinque Terre introduces new hiking restrictions
description: The Cinque Terre, a popular hiking destination in Italy, has introduced new restrictions aimed at reducing overcrowding and protecting the environment. The new rules limit the number of hikers allowed on certain trails and require visitors to obtain a permit in advance.
